VIDEO_OVERRIDE_OPACITY: When an opacity is specified by a video, use that opacity.
VIDEO_OVERRIDE_COLOR: When a color is specified by a video, use that color settings.
VIDEO_OVERRIDE_HIGHLIGHT_STYLE: When a highlight is specified by a video, use that highlight.
default.style.name: Style %@
VIDEO_OVERRIDE_FONT_STYLE: When a font is specified by a video, use that font.
VIDEO_OVERRIDE_EDGE_STYLE: When an edge style is specified by a video, use that edge style.
VIDEO_OVERRIDE_SIZE: When a size is specified by a video, use that size.
FONT_CATEGORY_FOOTER_TEXT: Select fonts to be used when content requests a specific style of font be displayed.
